rows.label: tlk45420141_02_tlk0001
rows.name:
To think the inscriptions here
turned out to be the work of the
ancient Nopon.

rows.label: tlk45420141_02_tlk0002
rows.name:
I was talking with Alisdeigh, and he
explained that long ago, those murals
used to be just above water level.

rows.label: tlk45420141_02_tlk0003
rows.name:
Over the years, the place drained out,
and now at the bottom of what used
to be a lake...

rows.label: tlk45420141_02_tlk0004
rows.name:
We have the whole mercenary village
of Hr√¶svelgr!

rows.label: tlk45420141_02_tlk0005
rows.name:
The history of Alst holds so many
mysteries to unravel. It's fascinating!

rows.label: tlk45420141_02_tlk0006
rows.name:
I think I'm going to set out wandering
again soon. I want to find more places
like this one, brimming with mystery!
